title: Strongest Boss System - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Game Elements   Gangs   Level System   Lottery   Male Protagonist
author: Fen Qiyue   封七月
description:
What is a villain?

    Is the fist all over the world, vertical and horizontal for a lifetime, or ten thousand people are enemies, stirring up the wind and clouds?

    With the rebirth of life and the addition of the Strongest Villain System, Su Xin can acquire all the  skills of the villains in the martial arts world of the previous life.

    'to be a man, you must keep your word. If you say kill your whole family,then kill your whole family. My name is Su Xin, and I am a man of my word. '>
